title: SkyHighTrip
description: A comprehensive travel booking platform built with PHP that integrates with the Amadeus API to provide real-time flight and hotel booking services. The platform offers seamless search, comparison, and booking capabilities for flights and accommodations with live pricing and availability data.
features: Real-time flight search using Amadeus API

title: YoungSietar
description: A professional business website showcasing corporate services, team information, and client portfolio. Designed with clean, modern aesthetics to establish strong brand presence.

title: Progressive Graphics Employee Attendance Management System
description: A comprehensive employee attendance management system built with Laravel, featuring clock in/out functionality, employee chat communication, event calendar, task management, and export capabilities. Designed to streamline employee time tracking and improve workplace communication and productivity.
features: Admin dashboard with employee clock in/out management
Employee chat system using Chatify for seamless communication
Interactive event calendar for company-wide events
Task assignment system with admin controls

title: XRDigitech
description: A WordPress-powered website for an AR/VR and software solutions company showcasing immersive projects, 3D/interactive demos, enterprise software services, and industry use cases. Built to highlight spatial computing capabilities, custom software development, case studies, and lead capture with performant media handling.
features: Portfolio of AR/VR projects with rich media
Service pages and industry use cases

title: FreshEarth
description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built on Shopify specializing in premium organic fruits, nuts, and seeds. The website features an intuitive shopping experience with detailed product catalogs, nutritional information, and sustainable packaging options. Designed to promote healthy living through natural, organic products sourced from trusted suppliers.

title: IconTravels
description: A WordPress-based travel agency website showcasing luxury travel experiences, destinations, and services. Built as a contact-focused platform where customers can browse travel packages and contact the agency directly for bookings and personalized vacation planning.

title: Gurudwara Sadh Sangat
description: A comprehensive WordPress website for Gurudwara Sadh Sangat, designed to serve the spiritual community with information about religious services, events, community programs, and spiritual guidance. The website provides an intuitive interface for devotees to access gurudwara information, view schedules, and stay connected with the community.
features: Homepage with spiritual design and welcoming interface
Event calendar for religious ceremonies and programs
Information about daily services and timings
Photo galleries of events and ceremonies
Contact forms for inquiries and donations
SEO optimization for local search visibility

title: Abacus Mental Mathematics Academy
description: A professional WordPress website for Abacus Mental Mathematics Academy, designed to showcase abacus courses, training programs, and educational services. The website provides an engaging platform for parents and students to learn about mental mathematics training, view course details, enroll in programs, and track student progress.
features: Interactive homepage showcasing abacus benefits and courses
Course catalog with detailed program descriptions
Testimonials and success stories from students
Event calendar for workshops and competitions
Contact forms for inquiries and consultations
Blog section for educational tips and updates
Mobile responsive design for all devices
Payment gateway integration for course fees
